articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects E-Library at Kim Il Sung Univ.
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects E-Library at Kim Il Sung Univ.
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the newly-built E-Library at Kim Il Sung University. 
					 He looked round the interior of the library including reading rooms and remote-controlled lecture rooms for a long while to acquaint himself in detail with its construction and technical equipment. He expressed great satisfaction with the successful construction of the modern library which meets the need of the age of knowledge-based economy. 
					
					 Noting that all structures of the wonderfully-built library are associated with the warm patriotic devotion of soldier-builders, he highly appreciated the feats performed by the servicepersons of the unit who have always played a vanguard role in the socialist construction.
					
					 Seeing the happy students absorbed in scientific inquiry, fully enjoying the benefits of the advantageous socialist educational system at the library, he was very pleased with the fact that it has become possible to hand over to posterity an edifice of eternal value which may remain impeccable even in the distant future.
					
					 He underlined the need to always pay deep attention to the study and life of the students intensely loyal to the Party and the revolution as they are treasures of the country.
					
					 He said that in order to build more structures in the era of Songun as required by the aesthetic desire and need of the Korean people it is necessary to actively explore and apply new, unique and peculiar architectural style and steadily bring about innovations in the formative art of the construction.
					
					 After going round the Educational and Scientific Exhibition of the university, he highly appreciated the shining feats performed by the university. He said that the university has trained a lot of revolutionary talents for the last more than six decades, thus playing a pivotal role in implementing the nation's policy of training native cadres and its policy of intellectualizing all members of the society. The university has rendered great services for the development of the nation's science and technology by actively conducting scientific researches, he added. 
					
					 He met the teachers and researchers who have performed distinguished feats in the education and scientific researches at the university and gave a warm pep-talk to them.
					
					 He watched a swimming contest of students under way at the indoor swimming pool before commanding a bird's-eye view of the university town covering a vast area of Ryongnam Hill.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the school buildings, dormitories, libraries, indoor stadium and various other facilities for education and upbringing standing in good order around Ryongnam Hill, he said that it is the high pride of the WPK and people of the DPRK to have prestigious Kim Il Sung University, the highest seat of Juche-based education. 
					
					 Noting that the university is a precious treasure for national prosperity to be handed down to the generations to come, he set forth highly important tasks which would serve as guidelines for developing the university.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il and Kim Yang Gon, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and its other senior officials.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Condolences Polish Sejm Speaker
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Condolences Polish Sejm Speaker
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of condolences to Bronislaw Komorowski, speaker of Sejm of the Republic of Poland, on April 11 in connection with the airliner crash which claimed the lives of Lech Aleksander Kaczynski, its president, and his wife and suite members.
					 Kim in the message expressed deep condolences to the speaker and, through him, to the government and people of Poland and the bereaved family members over their deaths.

articles.title: 12th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
articles.content:
12th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The 12th Kimilsungia Festival was opened with due ceremony on Monday.
					 The venue of the festival presented a veritable sea of Kimilsungias brought into full bloom with good care by units of the Korean People's Army, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions, working people's organizations, scientific, educational, public health and media institutions, enterprises, servicepersons, working people, school youth and children, overseas compatriots and foreign embassies and missions of international organizations including the Indonesian embassy here, friendship and solidarity organizations, enterprises, figures and members of the associations for supporting the propagation of immortal flowers of different countries.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Ki Nam and officials of ministries, national institutions and working people's organizations, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and working people.
					
					 On hand were a delegation of Koreans in Japan led by Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, on a visit to the socialist homeland on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, delegations of overseas compatriots and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Present there on invitation were an Indonesian government cultural delegation led by Wardiyatmo, general secretary of the Ministry of Culture and Tourism, Fitri Riyanti, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Indonesian embassy here, and embassy officials, Ratna Sari Dewi Sukarno, director of the Dewi Sukarno Office in Japan, who is honorary chairperson of the Society for Disseminating and Supporting Immortal Flowers, and her party, Abdoulaye Diallo, representative of the Guinean Kimilsungia Greenhouse, and other foreign guests.
					
					An Tong Chun, minister of Culture, addressing the ceremony, said that this festival would mark a significant occasion in once again fully demonstrating the faith and will of the army and the people of the DPRK waging a dynamic struggle for the final victory in the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the experienced and tested leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Wardiyatmo in his congratulatory speech recalled that President Sukarno made a present of newly bred rare flower to President Kim Il Sung when he was visiting Indonesia in 1965, adding that Kimilsungia became pride of the Korean people.
					
					The participants looked round the venue of the festival.

articles.title: Congratulations from Syrian Defence Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations from Syrian Defence Minister
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory message and a large floral basket by Ali Muhammad Habib Mahmoud, deputy commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces and defence minister of Syria, on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the 78th founding anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 The message and basket were handed to the DPRK ambassador to Syria on April 8 by the director of the Section of Protocol of the Organizational and Administrative Department of the Ministry of Defence of Syria.

articles.title: Congratulations from Russia
articles.content:
Congratulations from Russia
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message and a gift from the State Academy Beryozka Dancing Troupe of Russia Named after N. S. Nadezhdina on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of his election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 They were handed to the DPRK ambassador to Russia by Mira Koltsova, head of the troupe, on April 6.
					
					 Meanwhile, Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the director of the Nakhodka City Greening Office of Russia.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the board director of the Shenyang Korean Trade and Investment Consultating Ltd. of China and his party participating in the 12th Kimilsungia Festival.
					The gift was handed to an official concerned on Monday by Board Director Liu Chensheng.

articles.title: Floral Basket Placed before Statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Basket Placed before Statue of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps here laid a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on Monday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The guests placed the floral basket before his statue in profound reverence and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organization here visited Mangyongdae on Monday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 They first went to the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum where on display are the historic data and relics on the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung and the revolutionary activities of his family members.
					
					 Then they went round the historic relics kept well at the old home of the President in Mangyongdae and the revolutionary sites on Mangyong Hill with deep emotion.
					
					 Cuban Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano said that they recollect the immortal revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung whenever visiting Mangyongdae.
					
					He expressed belief that the Korean people would build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is creditably carrying forward to completion the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They also visited the venue of the 12th Kimilsungia Festival.
					
					 After visit they made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Venue of 12th Kimilsungia Festival
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Venue of 12th Kimilsungia Festival
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps and the economic and commercial councilors corps here Monday visited the venue of the 12th Kimilsungia Festival on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The guests looked round potted Kimilsungias which came to full bloom with deep reverence and heartfelt sincerity of the Korean people and the world progressives for President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 At the end of the visit they made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Foreigners Arrive
articles.content:
Foreigners Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Personages of different countries arrived here on Monday to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					 Among them were Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the IIJI, and his party and Harish Gupta, director-general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Arriving also were a delegation of the China Institutes of Contemporary International Relations headed by Vice-President Ji Zhiye, a friendship and tourist visiting group of China led by                      Vice-Chairman of the National Tourism Administration Zhu Shanzhong and a delegation of parliamentarians of Bundestag from the ruling parties of Germany led by Peter Gauweiler, member of Bundestag of the Christian Social Union and chairman of the Sub-committee of Policy of Foreign Culture and Education of the Bundestag Foreign Affairs Committee.

articles.title: Health Teas Conspicuous in Food Festival
articles.content:
Health Teas Conspicuous in Food Festival
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Various kinds of health teas attracted attention of visitors in the 15th April Holiday Food Festival held at the People's Palace of Culture in Pyongyang between April 6 and 8.
					 Unjong-trademarked Kangryong green tea contains alkaloids, various essential amino acids and other ingredients which have a pharmacological action.
					
					 It helps one feel refreshed and prevent such diseases as arteriosclerosis, hypertension and cardiomegaly. It is also good for recovery from fatigue, urination, detoxification and prevention of cancer and aging. 
					
					 Ogwa tea made of walnut, ginkgo nut, chestnut, ginger and jujube is efficacious for such diseases as respiratory, circulatory and urinary troubles.
					
					 Teas made of pickpurse and dandelion are popular in spring.
					
					 Also presented to the festival were maize, scorched-rice, pine-needle, barley, parsley, adlay and many other teas.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Calligraphic Style, Treasure of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Calligraphic Style, Treasure of Korean Nation
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's style of handwriting is valued as treasure of the Korean nation.
					 His handwritings were carved in many monuments, bridges, barrages and natural rocks in all areas of the country.
					
					His autographs written in Korean or Chinese characters are found in the monument of his poem in General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp, hanging boards of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Okryu Bridge and Kumnung Tunnel, and monuments to the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, West Sea Barrage and Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower.
					
					 Seen in the monument to the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong is an inscription "The noble revolutionary spirit displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs will dwell forever in the hearts of our Party and our people. October 10, 1985 Kim Il Sung". The inscription is associated with the President's intention to give brilliance to the life of the anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs and make the younger generation inherit their indomitable revolutionary spirit.
					
					 His autographs are characterized by great power, stamina, and vigor.
					
					 Typical of them is an inscription of the monument to the West Sea Barrage. It says, "The West Sea Barrage is a great creation of the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude of our people. Glory to the barrage builders! May 22, 1986 Kim Il Sung".
					
					 Among his autographs are "The United Front Tower", "Chongchon Bridge", "Chungsong Bridge" and "Rungna Bridge".

articles.title: KCNA Terms US Talk about "Contingency" Nonsensical
articles.content:
KCNA Terms US Talk about "Contingency" Nonsensical
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- These days the U.S. is getting extremely provocative towards the DPRK, vociferating about possible "contingency" in it. 
					 According to the Washington Post and the Japanese Mainichi Shimbun and other newspapers, the commander of the U.S. marines in the Pacific recently blustered there is the great possibility of "contingency" in north Korea and that it is the most important duty of the U.S. marines in Okinawa to promptly eliminate its nukes in case of emergency.
					
					 This is a clear proof that the U.S. is stepping up all the preparations for a surprise attack on the DPRK, while making "contingency" an established fact. 
					
					 Timed to coincide with the U.S. spread of the rumor about "contingency," some quarters have gone the lengths of floating even the fiction that "a commotion" may occur in the DPRK before coming November. 
					
					 This is nothing but a fallacy which can be crafted only by those who are obsessed with a wild ambition to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK cannot but remind them of some facts as they are going reckless, utterly ignorant of its reality.
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces claimed there arose a "problem" in the DPRK. But, it was exactly at that time that the mass-production of Juche iron and fiber of our own invention was kicked off in the DPRK. In future its people will witness the successful operation of light water reactors built entirely with locally available raw materials and indigenous technology.
					
					 This is the fruition of the full display of the inexhaustible mental power by the army and people of the DPRK single-mindedly united around the leader. This will be a clear message to the hostile forces keen to tighten the sanctions against the DPRK and escalate their moves to isolate and stifle it and a striking demonstration of the solidity and invincibility of its Juche-based socialist system. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK form a community with the headquarters of the revolution in which they share the same destiny.
					
					 The hostile forces are making much fuss, ballyhooing about instable society of the DPRK. This charade, however, only renders its army and people more keenly aware of who is their enemy and what it seeks. It, at the same time, helps demonstrate the unbreakable single-minded unity of the headquarters and them.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to disturb the mindset of people and tear the army and people off the headquarters of the revolution, threatening their right to existence through unprecedentedly harsh sanctions, but this will get it nowhere. 
					
					 The rash acts of the U.S. and its followers only bring their ulterior motives into daylight. 
					
					 Mainichi Shimbun commented on the fact that the remarks made by the commander of the U.S. marines in the Pacific that north Korea is the main operational theatre of the U.S. marines in Okinawa disclosed the U.S. intention to contain the influence of China. There is some sense in saying so. 
					
					 It is the long-pursued Korean strategy of the U.S. to turn the whole of the Korean Peninsula into a strategic springboard from which to establish domination over the Asian continent.
					
					 After fleeing to the south from the northern half of Korea during the last Korean war the U.S. forces prattled they would come back when azaleas come into bloom. The U.S. regards the present time as a golden chance to realize its wild ambition.
					
					 The U.S. staged such reckless war exercises as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises as a challenge to the efforts of the parties concerned to push ahead with the process for peace and the denuclearization of the peninsula. It is by no means fortuitous that it is taking a bellicose attitude towards the DPRK, declaring for the first time that the DPRK is the operational theatre of the U.S. marines in Okinawa. 
					
					 As seen above, the U.S. talk about "contingency" means a call for stifling the DPRK, a scenario for the second Korean war and a theory for unchallenged domination over the peninsula and the rest of Asia.
					
					 The anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and its followers including confabs on a war scenario, military exercises, economic sanctions, psychological warfare, etc. and the general orientation of the U.S. Korea policy are all designed to achieve "unification of systems on the Korean Peninsula" through the creation of "contingency" in the DPRK. It will never remain an onlooker to this grave situation but will steadily bolster up its war deterrent for self-defence. 
					
					 In case a war breaks out in Korea, the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces can never dodge the merciless and just strikes of the Korean People's Army, be they in Okinawa or in any other place.
					
					 The DPRK warns the U.S. and other hostile forces busy talking about the fictitious "contingency" not to run amuck.
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff that the trumpeting about "contingency" is bound to go bust just as all the propagandas about "crises in north Korea" made by the enemies for years proved to be false.
					
					 This will be proved by a great event--the victory to be won in the drive for building a thriving nation thanks to the Juche idea and Songun idea, the truth of the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Wholly to Blame for Derailing Tour
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Wholly to Blame for Derailing Tour
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is challenging the north, describing its announcement of the plan to take a measure for freezing real estates of the south side in Mt. Kumgang Tourist Zone as "a violation of property right" and "violation of south-north agreement and international norms." This is a cynical ploy to evade the responsibility for derailing the tour at any cost by misleading the public opinion at home and abroad.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group's talk about "violation of property right" and "violation of agreement" is nonsensical and it is nothing but a far-fetched assertion which can convince no one, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 As far as the issue of "violation of property right" is concerned, it is the very issue to be raised by the north. Immeasurable is the economic loss the north suffered for nearly two years due to the suspension of the tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 It is darn ridiculous for the south Korean authorities to make outcries over the so-called "violation of agreement" though they are to blame for it. According to international practice, when any economic agreement or contract is left unimplemented for a certain period, it is bound to lose its validity. Every country of the world severely punishes those who violate its law. The action to be taken by the north is in line with the universally accepted order and practice. 
					
					 The lesson the Korean nation came to draw once again from the present situation where the tour is on the verge of collapse is that it is impossible to improve the north-south relations, achieve the reunification of the country and the common prosperity of the nation nor is it possible to properly conduct tour as long as the conservative group of south Korea veiled with "pragmatism" is allowed to stay in power.
					
					 By blocking the tour of Mt. Kumgang the south Korean conservative authorities blatantly scuppered the Koreans' strong desire for reunification. This is the crime hideous enough to face severe judgment of history and the nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Juche Idea in Practice
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Juche Idea in Practice
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, serves as the only guiding idea of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution and as the lifeline for building a great prosperous and powerful nation. All the people should glorify the honor of being his soldiers and disciples and dash like the wind toward the victory in the drive to build a thriving nation under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday stresses this in an editorial.
					
					 To glorify the Juche idea in practice represents the greatest loyalty and noblest moral obligation to the President and it is a sacred work for victoriously advancing the Korean revolution, pioneered by the President, along the track of independence forever, it notes.
					
					 It is also the worthwhile work for demonstrating the DPRK as a thriving socialist country where the wishes of the President are translated into reality, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 To glorify the Juche idea in practice just means to advance the Korean revolution as instructed and intended by the President and glorify the DPRK as a thriving socialist nation of Juche where the long-cherished ideals of the people are coming to reality in keeping with his intention and desire.
					
					 As they are guided by the Juche idea, the Korean people have emerged the people strong in the spirit of national independence and the DPRK has demonstrated its might as a power of independence and a fortress of socialism.
					
					 Now our country witnesses the eye-opening and spectacular era in which the Juche idea brings excellent results and all ideals of the people come true.
					
					 All servicepersons and people should dynamically advance along the road indicated by the Juche idea, deeply cherishing the great national pride and honor of living and making revolution in the homeland of the great idea of era.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are sure to win in the drive for building a thriving nation as there are the great Juche idea whose brilliant rays light the road ahead of them and the seasoned and tested leadership of the headquarters of the revolution.

articles.title: Actions for Judging Group of Traitors Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Judging Group of Traitors Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- 34 organizations of different circles in south Korea including the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Peasants Associations, the Federation of the Poor, the Women's Solidarity, the Youth Solidarity and the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century formed the "Action Headquarters for the People's Sovereignty", an organization for solidarity and alliance to intensify the actions for judging the puppet group of traitors, on April. 8. 
					 A press conference took place in Seoul on the same day in this connection. 
					
					 The organization there said that the two years of the office of the present authorities were a period in which they swam against the trend of the times by violating democracy, bringing the people's living to destitution, escalating the inter-Korean confrontation, etc. 
					
					 It recalled that people from all walks of life such as workers, peasants, the poor, women and youth and students pooled their efforts to decisively judge the present regime at "the elections to the local self-governing bodies" and regain the sovereignty of the people. 
					
					 Noting that the people will demonstrate their tremendous might through the "elections", the organization declared it would stage actions in various forms and by different methods. 
					
					 At the end of the press conference the members of the organization conducted actions denouncing the puppet group for intensifying its suppression of the labor movement, deteriorating the inter-Korean relations, pushing ahead with the "projects for improving the four big rivers" and the moves to put media under its control, etc.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Blocking Resumption of Tour
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Blocking Resumption of Tour
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea made public a statement on April 9 condemning the puppet authorities for having blocked the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang. 
					 The statement said that the north entered the phase of practical action as already warned now that there is no way to save the tour from a crisis. 
					
					 We cannot but question the "government" what it has done till the situation reached such pass, the statement said, chiding the authorities for having obstructed the resumption of the tour, talking about the "three conditions" and the like. 
					
					 The statement recalled that the north took such a resolute action because the present regime negated the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and showed no will to improve the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 Hyon In Thaek, minister of "Unification," has not taken any measure regarding the issue of the tour of Mt. Kumgang, only repeating the word of "regret" and blustering that the "government's" stand to resume the tour remains unchanged, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 He should be forced to step down as he is to blame for such situation. 
					
					 The "government" should take a sincere approach toward a dialogue with the north and reach an agreement on resuming the tour. 
					
					 Otherwise, not only the inter-Korean relations will collapse but also the economy of south Korea will go bankrupt and its regime fall.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Guinea
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in pamphlet by a publishing house of Guinea.
					 The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), elucidates the fact that the six-decade long history of the DPRK is a history of gigantic struggle and victory and a history of great creation and changes in which the Korean people have built a prosperous socialist country while defending the independence and honor of the country, going through the tempests of the revolution, under the guidance of the great leader and party. And it clarifies the idea that even a small and backward country can turn into a developed and dignified power when it is guided by great leader and party.
					
					 Also expounded in the work are the tasks and ways for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the banner of the Juche idea and Songun.
					
					 A ceremony of releasing the work took place at the publishing house on April. 5.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released a special issue of its bulletin carrying the beaming image of President Kim Il Sung on April 3 to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					 Noting that the DPRK instituted the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung as the Day of the Sun in July 1997, the bulletin in an article captioned "The Day of the Sun" said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union on Oct. 17, 1926, and the Young Communist League of Korea on Aug. 28, 1927. He founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army on April 25, 1932, and liberated Korea from the Japanese imperialists' occupation on Aug. 15, 1945.
					
					 He founded the party, army and state and turned Korea, once backward, into a developed industrial country.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "The Eternal President of the DPRK" introduced in detail the facts that a decision of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Central People's Committee of the DPRK and the Administration Council of the DPRK on holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem forever was adopted and the Kumsusan Memorial Palace turned into the sacred temple of Juche in the DPRK.

articles.title: Exploits of Great Persons Praised
articles.content:
Exploits of Great Persons Praised
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Dilip Barua, general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), issued a statement on April 6 to commemorate the Day of the Sun and the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The statement noted that thanks to President Kim Il Sung's admirable ideological and theoretical activities and revolutionary practices the DPRK turned into a powerful socialist country and the socialist and anti-imperialist independent forces grew stronger in the international arena.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a prominent leader of the Korean people and the world revolutionary people struggling for independence, it said, adding: The great exploits he performed for independence of the popular masses will shine long with the history of humankind.
					
					 The statement stressed that Kim Jong Il's election as NDC chairman of the DPRK was a historic event of weighty significance in the realization of global independence.
					
					 It expressed belief that the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il who is creditably carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung would bring great victory and glory to the Korean people and the world revolutionary people.

articles.title: DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated
articles.content:
DPRK's April Holidays Commemorated
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks, seminars, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Tunisia, Bangladesh, Pakistan, Singapore and Malaysia from March 31 to April 5 to commemorate the Day of the Sun, the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 78th anniversary of the foundation of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos on the glorious revolutionary histories and undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					The secretary general of the People's Unity Party of Tunisia said that the Korean people hold 
						Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK, adding that his party would always remember his immortal exploits.
					
					 Speakers at the seminar held in Bangladesh noted that Kim Il Sung turned the DPRK into the strongest fortress of independence in the world and made a great contribution to accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Pakistan Society for the Study of Independence said that the undying feats performed by Kim Il Sung in founding the army are shedding more brilliant rays thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Chairman of the NDC Kim Jong Il. No force on earth can match the might of the army and people of the DPRK led by him, the chairman added. 
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched such Korean films as "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation", "Arms of Korea" and "The Country I Saw".

articles.title: Floral Basket Placed before Image of Kim Il Sung by OSPAAAL
articles.content:
Floral Basket Placed before Image of Kim Il Sung by OSPAAAL
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A function of laying a floral basket before the beaming image of President Kim Il Sung took place by the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America (OSPAAAL) on April 9 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Attending the function were Secretary-General Alfonso Fraga Perez and members of the OSPAAAL and Kwon Sung Chol, DPRK ambassador to Cuba, and staff members of his embassy. 
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the beaming image of Kim Il Sung before paying tribute to him.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- In the latter part of December Juche 27 (1938) when the anti-Japanese armed struggle was at its height, the members of a unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army were marching through a dense forest. One day they, given a rest order, all sank down on the ground covered with snow, so tired with ceaseless fierce battles and continued march.
					 Anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk, however, picked up pieces of wood to make a fire and boiled water for other guerrillas without a rest.
					
					 She then gave a cup of hot water to President Kim Il Sung ahead of others.
					
					 He highly appreciated her devotion to comrades-in-arms and told her to give hot water to all others.
					
					 Cooks of the unit, much moved by her comradeship, braced themselves up to follow her.
					
					 With all the members regaining strength after drinking hot water, the heroine encouraged them to overcome hardships and advance into the homeland with Kim Il Sung for bringing about a high tide in the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo a presidente de Sejm
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo a presidente de Sejm
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio la vispera un telegrama de condolencias al presidente de Sejm (camara de representantes) de la Republica de Polonia, Bronislaw Komorowski, en relacion con que debido al inesperado accidente de avion fallecieron el presidente de la Republica de Polonia Lech Aleksander Kaczynski, su esposa y acompanantes.
					El remitente expresa al destinatario y, por su conducto, al gobierno y el pueblo de Polonia asi como a los familiares de las victimas profundas condolencias.

articles.title: Inaugurado el XII Festival de Kimilsungias
articles.content:
Inaugurado el XII Festival de Kimilsungias
 Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurado el dia 12 en la capitalina Exposicion Permanente de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia el XII Festival de Kimilsungias.
					 El lugar del festival se convirtio en el mar de kimilsungias que abren plenamente sus petalos, cultivadas con sinceridad por las unidades del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el Consejo de Ministros, los ministerios, los organos centrales, las entidades de masas, las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, salud publica, prensa e informacion,  las empresas, militares del ejercito popular, trabajadores,  jovenes y ninos escolares, coreanos en ultramar, la Embajada de la Republica de Indonesia y otras representaciones diplomaticas de varios paises, las representaciones de organizaciones internacionales en Corea, las entidades de amistad y solidaridad, empresas, personalidades y los miembros de la asociacion de ayuda a la divulgacion de las inmortales flores, de paises extranjeros.
					
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Ki Nam, funcionarios de ministerios, organos centrales y entidades de masas, militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea y trabajadores.
					
					 Participaron tambien la delegacion de coreanos residentes en Japon presidida por el vicepresidente del Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos en Japon (Chongryon) Nam Sung U y otras delegaciones de compatriotas y coreanos en ultramar de visita en la patria socialista con motivo del Dia del Sol.
					
					A la ocasion fueron invitados la delegacion cultural gubernamental de la Republica de Indonesia presidida por el secretario general del Ministerio de Cultura y Turismo, Wardiyatmo, el encargado de negocios a.i Fitri Riyanti y otros miembros de la embajada de Indonesia en Corea, el director de la Oficina Dewi Sukarno en Japon y jefe honorario de la Sociedad de Ayuda a la Divulgacion de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia, Ratna Sari Dewi Sukarno y su comitiva, el delegado del invernaculo de Kimilsungias de Guinea, Abdoulaye Diallo, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					An Tong Chun, en su discurso inaugural, senalo que el presente festival servira de un motivo significativo de volver a manifestar claramente la fe y la voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que luchan con tenacidad por la victoria final de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera y la coronacion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la veterana y probada direccion del Dirigente      Kim Jong Il.
					
					El jefe de la delegacion indonesa Wardiyatmo, en su discurso de felicitacion, subrayo que en 1965, el presidente Sukarno regalo a Su Excelencia el Presidente Kim Il Sung de visita en Indonesia, la preciosa flor cultivada nuevamente, y destaco que hoy dia, la kimilsungia ha sido la orgullosa del pueblo coreano.
					
					Los participantes recorrieron el lugar del festival.

articles.title: Inaugurado II Festival Artistico Nacional de Abril en Primavera
articles.content:
Inaugurado II Festival Artistico Nacional de Abril en Primavera
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurado la vispera en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el segundo Festival Artistico Nacional de Abril en Primavera.
					En este evento participaran los especialistas en arte de casi 70 unidades, los artistas coreanos en ultramar, los miembros de los grupos de propaganda artistica y de agitacion artistica movil y los trabajadores.
					
					A la ceremonia de inauguracion asistieron Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Jung Rin, Kim Ki Nam, el vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros O Su Yong, el presidente del comite organizador del festival y ministro de Cultura An Tong Chun, y otros funcionarioss, artistas y trabajadores.
					
					En el fondo de la escena del lugar del acto aparecieron los cuadros historicos alusivos a las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes dedicaron todo lo suyo a desarrollar el arte del Juche.
					
					El presidente del comite organizador, en su discurso, subrayo que el presente es un festival artistico de gran significacion en que resonaran como himno al Sol la ferviente anoranza del pueblo coreano al Presidente, el infinito orgullo y dignidad nacional de haber contado al gran hombre sin par.
					
					Recordo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, con la noble obligacion moral al Presidente, hizo organizar el festival en cuestion para satisfacer a nuestro pueblo el anhelo de cantar para siempre las canciones de elogio al gran hombre y conduce sabiamente la labor del festival para que este se lleve a cabo solemnemente.
					
					Manifesto su conviccion de que el festival contribuira a dar la alegria al pueblo coreano que celebra el Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente) y fomentar el ambiente de la fiesta primaveral en abril.
					
					Acto seguido, hubo la funcion inaugural.

articles.title: Tiene lugar 23o Torneo de Maraton por el Premio Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Tiene lugar 23o Torneo de Maraton por el Premio Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol, tuvo lugar el dia 11 en esta capital el 23o Torneo Internacional de Maraton por el Premio Mangyongdae como evento concurrente de la Asociacion Internacional de Federaciones Atleticas.
					A la ceremonia inaugural efectuada en el Estadio Kim Il Sung asistieron el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Kim Jung Rin, el ministro de Construccion y de Industria de Materiales de Construccion y presidente de la Asociacion Coreana de Maraton, Tong Jong Ho, y otros funcionarios, asi como los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Participaron tambien los maratonistas de Corea, China, Zimbabwe, Ucrania, Kenia, Sudafrica, Etiopia y Namibia.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, el presidente del Comite de Direccion de Deportes, Pak Hak Son, expreso su conviccion de que el torneo servira de importante motivo para celebrar significativamente el Dia del Sol y desarrollar en comun las tecnologias de esa disciplina y profundizar la amistad entre varios paises del mundo.
					
					En la ocasion compitieron mas de 700 atletas de ambos generos.
					
					El ucranio Babaryka Ivan y la coreana Kim Kum Ok ocuparon el primer lugar, respectivamente.
					
					Y los muchachos coreanos Pak Song Chol y Ri Yong Ho y sus compatriotas Jong Yong Ok y Kim Mi Gyong se ubicaron en el segundo y tercer lugares en sus respectivos sexos.
					
					En la ceremonia de clausura fueron entregados a los ganadores copas, medallas y diplomas.

articles.title: ATCC comenta la teoria de supuesta "situacion de emergencia" en RPDC
articles.content:
ATCC comenta la teoria de supuesta "situacion de emergencia" en RPDC
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ATCC) -- Ultimamente, Estados Unidos actua de manera muy provocativa hablando tanto de la posibilidad de la supuesta "situacion de emergencia" en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 Segun "Washington Post", "Mainichi Shimbun" y otros medios, el comandante de la infanteria de marina norteamericana de la region del Pacifico dijo hace poco que hay grandes posibilidades de que se de una "situacion de emergencia" en la RPDC y anadio que cuando suceda eso, al cuerpo de marines de EE.UU. en Okinawa le toca la mas importante mision de eliminar con rapidez las armas nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					 Este dicho deviene una buena prueba de que ese imperio se prepara en todos los sentidos para atacar sorpresivamente a la RPDC considerando la "situacion de emergencia" como hecho consumado.
					
					 En consonancia con ese rumor difundido por EE.UU., en algunas partes circula el chisme de que se desatara algun "motin" en la RPDC antes de noviembre de este ano.
					
					 Esta ilusion la pueden tener solo los fanaticos por aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					 Hace falta recordarles algunos hechos a ellos que andan tan imprudentes sin saber ni jota de la realidad de la RPDC.
					
					 Justamente cuando EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles hablaban del surgimiento de un supuesto "problema" en Corea, nacieron en esta el acero y la fibra denominados con Juche. Y en el futuro ellos podran ver el reactor de agua ligera que se pondra en pleno funcionamiento basado en las materias primas y tecnicas nacionales.
					
					 Esto deviene la respuesta a la brutal sancion y las maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento de las fuerzas hostiles y la prueba de la solidez y la invencibilidad del regimen socialista coreano del Juche, siendo el resultado del inagotable poderio espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, unidos monoliticamente en torno a su dirigente.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea comparten el mismo destino con la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					 Si bien las fuerzas hostiles dicen que la RPDC esta desestabilizada por dentro, esta mentira hace a los militares y habitantes coreanos conocer mejor quien es su enemigo y que es lo que desea este. De esta manera, se hace cada vez mas indestructible la unidad monolitica entre la Direccion de la Revolucion y todos los militares y civiles de Corea.
					
					 EE.UU. intenta subvertir la opinion publica interna de Corea y separar al ejercito y al pueblo de la Direccion de la Revolucion amenazando por otra parte la existencia del pueblo coreano con la sancion de una crueldad sin precedente. Pero, esta estupidez traera resultados contraproducentes con lo que desea el imperio.
					
					 EE.UU. y sus seguidores actuaron esta vez con demasiada frivolidad desentranando su intencion.
					
					  Al comentar el reciente disparate del comandante de la infanteria de marina norteamericana de la region del Pacifico de que la "RPDC es el principal teatro operacional del cuerpo de marines en Okinawa", "Mainichi Shimbun" senalo que esto revela la intencion de EE.UU. de contrarrestar la influencia de China sobre la Peninsula Coreana. Tiene razon.
					
					  Desde hace mucho tiempo, EE.UU. ha venido persiguiendo la estrategia sobre Corea consistente en convertir toda la Peninsula Coreana en la base estrategica para establecer su dominio sobre el continente asiatico.
					
					  Durante la pasada guerra coreana, al verse obligadas a retirarse, las tropas norteamericanas juraban que volverian a avanzar hacia la RPDC en la proxima primavera. EE.UU. piensa que ahora es la oportunidad para cumplir ese juramento.
					
					  No es casual que EE.UU. haya desplegado los imprudentes ejercicios belicos como "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" en desafio a los esfuerzos de las partes interesadas por impulsar el proceso de paz y desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y anunciado por primera vez que la RPDC es el teatro operacional de sus infantes de marina acampados en Okinawa.
					
					  Como se ve, la teoria de la "situacion de emergencia" de EE.UU. no es otra sino la doctrina para atropellar a la RPDC, desatar la segunda guerra coreana e implantar el dominio monopolico sobre la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de Asia.
					
					 Todas las campanas anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles como el debate de los planes de guerra, ejercicios militares, sancion economica, guerra psicologica y la meta general de su politica sobre la RPDC estan orientadas al "derrocamiento del regimen" y la "reunificacion de sistemas sociales en la Peninsula Coreana" mediante la creacion de la "situacion de emergencia" en la RPDC.
					
					  La RPDC no se mostrara indiferente ante esta situacion grave y seguira fortaleciendo su disuasivo de guerra para la autodefensa.
					
					 De desatarse la guerra en este territorio, las tropas agresoras norteamericanas no podran esquivar el implacable golpe de justicia del Ejercito Popular de Corea, esten en Okinawa o esten en otras partes.
					
					  La RPDC advierte a EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles que actuen con prudencia.
					
					  Como historicamente resultaron erradas todas las teorias de los enemigos sobre la supuesta "crisis de la RPDC", el rumor de la "situacion de emergencia" tambien sera condenado al fracaso.
					
					  Lo dira el gran evento, o sea, el triunfo de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera que van trayendo el Juche y el Songun, verdad de la RPDC.

articles.title: Autoridades surcoreanas son responsables del fracaso de turismo
articles.content:
Autoridades surcoreanas son responsables del fracaso de turismo
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ATCC) -- En desafio a la medida de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de congelar los bienes inmuebles del Sur de Corea en la zona turistica del monte Kumgang, la camarilla de titeres surcoreanos insiste en la supuesta "violacion del derecho de propiedades, del acuerdo N-S y de las normas internacionales".
					Nadie se dejara enganar por ese embuste destinado a inducir en error la opinion publica interna y externa y eludir a toda costa la responsabilidad por el fracaso del turismo.
					
					Asi senala el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido el dia 12 y continua:
					
					Quien tiene el derecho a hablar de la "violacion al derecho de propiedades" es precisamente la RPDC que sufrio incontables perdidas economicas por la suspension de casi 2 anos del turismo al monte Kumgang.
					
					Ademas, no hay ningun motivo por el cual las autoridades surcoreanas cuestionaran sobresaltadas la supuesta "violacion del acuerdo". 
					
					La medida de congelar los inmuebles surcoreanos obedece al orden y la costumbre internacionales, segun los cuales un acuerdo o tratado economico queda invalidado automaticamente si no se implementa por algun periodo y cualquier pais del mundo castiga duro a los que violen su ley.
					
					Hoy dia en que esta en la fase de fracaso la labor turistica, la nacion coreana vuelve a sacar la leccion de que dejando intacta a la banda de conservadoras "pragmatistas" del Sur de Corea, no se puede impulsar el turismo siquiera, lejos de esperar el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas, la reunificacion del pais y la coprosperidad nacional.
					
					Por el solo delito de frustrar la aspiracion nacional a la reunificacion al impedir el turismo al monte Kumgang, las autoridades conservadoras del Sur de Corea seran condenadas a la severa sentencia de la historia y la nacion.
